1.verse: [A] Pawlus, apaustaulus Iesuis Xristaus þairh wiljan gudis bi gahaitam libainais sei ist in Xristau Iesu

2.verse: [A] Teimauþaiau, liubin barna, ansts, armaio, gawairþi fram guda attin jah Xristau Iesu fraujin unsaramma.

3.verse: [A] awiliudo guda meinamma, þammei skalkino fram fadreinam in hrainjai gahugdai, hvaiwa unsweibando haba bi þuk gaminþi in bidom meinaim naht jah daga,

4.verse: [A] gairnjands þuk gasaihvan, gamunands tagre þeinaize, ei fahedais usfullnau,

6.verse: [B] in þizozei waihtais gamaudja þuk anaqiujan anst gudis, sei ist in þus þairh analagein handiwe meinaizo.

7.verse: [B] unte ni gaf unsis guþ ahman faurhteins, ak mahtais jah friaþwos jah inaheins.

8.verse: [B] ni nunu skamai þuk weitwodiþos fraujins unsaris Iesuis nih meina, bandjins is, ak miþarbaidei aiwaggeljon bi mahtai gudis,

9.verse: [B] þis nasjandins uns jah laþondins laþonai weihai, ni bi waurstwam unsaraim, ak bi seinai leikainai jah anstai sei gibana ist unsis in Xristau Iesu faur mela aiweina,

10.verse: [B] iþ gaswikunþida nu þairh gabairhtein nasjandis unsaris Iesuis Xrista(us) , gatairandins raihtis dauþau, iþ galiuhtjandins libain jah unriurein þairh aiwagge<l>jon,

11.verse: [B] in þoei gasatiþs im ik merjands jah apaustaulus jah laisareis þiudo,

12.verse: [B] in þizozei fairinos jah þata winna; akei nih skama mik, unte wait hvamma galaubida, jah gatraua þammei mahteigs ist þata anafilh mein fastan in jainana dag.

13.verse: [B] frisaht habands hailaize waurde, þoei at mis hausides in galaubeinai jah friaþwai in Xristau Iesu,

14.verse: [B] þat(a) godo anafilh fastai þairh ahman weihana saei bauiþ in uns.

15.verse: [B] waist þatei afwandidedun sik af mis allai þaiei sind in Asiai, þizei ist Fwgailus jah Airmogaineis.

16.verse: [B] gibai armaion frauja Auneiseifauraus garda, unte ufta mik anaþrafstida jah naudibandjo meinaizo ni skamaida sik;

17.verse: [B] ak qimands in Rumai usdaudo sokida mik jah bigat.

18.verse: [B] gibai frauja imma bigitan armahairtein at fraujin in jainamma daga; jah hvan filu [mais] in Aifaison andbahtida mis, waila þu kant.

1.verse: [B] Þu nu, barn mein waliso, inswinþei þuk in anstai þizai in Xristau Iesu,

2.verse: [B] jah þoei hausides at mis þairh managa weitwodja [waurda gudis] þo anafilh triggwai<m> mannam, þaiei wairþai sijaina jah anþarans laisjan.

3.verse: [B] þu nu arbaidei swe gods gadrauhts Xristaus Iesuis.

4.verse: [B] ni ainshun drauhtinonds fraujin dugawindiþ sik gawaurkjam þizos aldais, ei galeikai þammei drauhtinoþ.

5.verse: [B] jah þan jabai haifsteiþ hvas, ni weipada, niba witodeigo brikiþ.

6.verse: [B] arbaidjands airþos waurstwja skal frumist akrane andniman.

7.verse: [B] fraþei þatei qiþa; gibiþ auk þus frauja fraþi us allaim.

8.verse: [B] Gamuneis Xristu Iesu urrisanana us dauþaim us fraiwa Daweidis bi aiwaggeljon meinai,

9.verse: [B] in þizaiei arbaidja und bandjos swe ubiltojis; akei waurd gudis nist gabundan.

10.verse: [B] inuh þis all gaþula bi þans gawalidans, ei jah þai ganist gatilona, sei ist in Xristau Iesu miþ wulþau aiweinamma.

11.verse: [B] triggw þata waurd: jabai miþgadauþnodedum, jah miþlibam;

12.verse: [B] jabai gaþulam, jah miþþiudanom; jabai afaikam, jah is afaikiþ uns;

13.verse: [B] jabai ni galaubjam, jains triggws wisiþ; afaikan sik silban ni mag.

14.verse: [B] þizei gamaudei, weitwodjands in andwairþja fraujins; waurdam weihan du ni waihtai daug, niba uswalteinai þaim hausjondam.

15.verse: [B] usdaudei þuk silban gakusanana usgiban guda waurstwjan unaiwiskana, raihtaba raidjandan waurd sunjos.

16.verse: [B] iþ þo dwalona usweihona lausawaurdja biwandei; unte filu gaggand du afgudein,

17.verse: [B] jah waurd ize swe gund wuliþ; þizeei ist Wmainaius jah Filetus,

18.verse: [B] þaiei bi sunjai uswissai usmetun, qiþandans usstass ju waurþana, jah galaubein sumaize uswaltidedun.

19.verse: [B] aþþan tulgus grunduwaddjus gudis standiþ, habands sigljo þata: kunþa frauja þans þaiei sind is, jah: afstandai af unselein hvazuh saei namnjai namo fraujins.

20.verse: [B] aþþan in mikilamma garda ni sind þatainei kasa gulþeina jah silubreina, ak jah triweina jah digana, jah suma du sweraim, sumuþ~þan du unsweraim.

21.verse: [B] aþþan jabai hvas gahrainjai sik þizei, wairþiþ kas du sweriþai, gaweihaiþ, bruk fraujin, du allamma waurstwe godaize gamanwiþ.

22.verse: [B] aþþan juggans lustuns þliuh; iþ laistei garaihtein, galaubein, friaþwa, gawairþi miþ þaim bidai anahaitandam frauja<n> us hrainjamma hairtin.

23.verse: [B] iþ þos dwalons jah untalons soknins biwandei, witands þatei gabairand sakjons.

24.verse: [B] iþ skalks fraujins ni skal sakan, ak qairrus wisan wiþra allans, laiseigs, usþulands,

25.verse: [B] in qairrein talzjands þans andstandandans, niu hvan gibai im guþ idreiga du ufkunþja sunjos,

26.verse: [B] jah usskarjaindau us unhulþins wruggon, fram þammei gafahanai tiuhanda afar is wiljin.

1.verse: [B] Aþþan þata kunneis ei in spedistaim dagam atgaggand jera sleidja,

2.verse: [B] jah wairþand mannans sik friondans, faihugairnai, bihaitjans, hauhhairtai, wajamerjandans, fadreinam ungahvairbai, launawargos, unairknai,

3.verse: [B] unhunslagai, unmildjai, fairinondans, ungahabandans sik, unmanariggwai, unseljai,

4.verse: [B] fralewjandans, untilamalskai, ufbaulidai, frijondans wiljan seinana mais þau guþ,

5.verse: [B] habandans hiwi gagudeins, iþ maht izos inwidandans; jah þans afwandei.

6.verse: [B] unte us þaim sind þaiei sliupand in gardins jah frahunþana tiuhand qineina afhlaþana frawaurhtim, þoe(i) tiuhanda lustum missaleikaim,

7.verse: [B] sinteino laisjandona sik <jah> ni aiw hvanhun in ufkunþja sunjos qiman mahteiga.

8.verse: [B] aþþan þamma haidau ei Jannis jah Mambres andstoþun Moseza, swa jah þai andstandand sunjai, mannans frawaurþanai ahin, uskusanai bi galaubein;

9.verse: [B] akei ni þeihand du filusnai, unte unwiti ize swikunþ wairþiþ allaim, swaswe jainaize was.

10.verse: [B] iþ þu galaista is laiseinai meinai, usmeta, muna, [sidau,] galaubeinai, usbeisnai, friaþwai, þulainai,

11.verse: [B] wrakjom, wunnim, hvileika mis waurþun in Antiaukiai, in Eikaunion, in Lwstrws, hvileikos wrakos usþulaida, jah us allaim mik galausida frauja.

12.verse: [B] jah þan allai þaiei wileina gagudaba liban in Xristau Iesu, wrakos winnand.

13.verse: [B] iþ ubilai mans jah liutai þeihand du wairsizin, airzjai jah airzjandans.

14.verse: [B] iþ þu framwairþis wisais in þaimei galaisides þuk jah gatrauaida sind þus, witands at hvamma ganamt,

15.verse: [B] jah þatei us barniskja weihos bokos kunþes, þos mahteigons þuk usfratwjan du ganistai þairh galaubein þo in Xristau Iesu.

16.verse: [B] all boko gudiskaizo<s> ahmateinais jah þaurftos du laiseinai, du gasahtai, du garaihteinai, du talzeinai in garaihtein,

17.verse: [B] ei ustauhans sijai manna gudis, du allamma waurstwe godaize gamanwiþs.

1.verse: [B] Weitwodja in andwairþja gudis jah fraujins Xristaus Iesuis, saei skal stojan qiwans jah dauþans bi qum is <jah> þiudinassu is:

2.verse: [B] merei waurd, stand ohteigo unuhteigo, gasak, gaþlaih, gahvotei in allai usbeisnai jah laiseinai.

3.verse: [B] wairþiþ mel þan haila laisein ni usþuland, ak du seinaim lustum dragand sis laisarjans, suþjondans hausein;

4.verse: [B] aþþan af sunjai hausein afwandjand, iþ du spillam gawandjand sik.

5.verse: [B] iþ þu andaþahts sijais in allaim, arbaidei, waurstw waurkei aiwaggelistins, andbahti þein usfullei.

6.verse: [B] aþþan ik ju hunsljada jah mel meinaizos diswissais atist.

7.verse: [B] haifst þo godon haifstida, run ustauh, galaubein gafastaida;

8.verse: [B] þaþro þan galagiþs ist mis waips garaihteins, þanei usgibiþ mis frauja in jainamma daga, sa <ga>raihta staua; aþþan ni þatainei mis, ak jah allaim þaiei frijond qum is.

10.verse: [B] unte Demas mis bilaiþ, frijonds þo nu ald, jah galaiþ du Þaissalauneikai, Krispus du Galatiai,

11.verse: [B] Lukas ist miþ mis ains. Marku andnimands brigg miþ þus silbin, unte ist mis bruks du and(bahtja).

13.verse: [A] hakul þanei bilaiþ in Trauadai at Karpau qimands atbair jah bokos, þishun maimbranans.

14.verse: [A] Alai[ai]ksandrus aizasmiþa managa mis unþiuþa ustaiknida; usgildiþ imma frauja bi waurstwam is;

15.verse: [A] þammei jah þu witai, filu auk andstoþ unsaraim waurdam.

16.verse: [A] in frumiston meinai sunjonai ni manna mis miþwas. ak allai mis biliþun, ni rahnjai(dau) (im) . . . .
